Summary Note:
Müller Schmidt Fischer and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Berlin. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Having worked for over 19 years, Müller Schmidt Fischer brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Müller Schmidt Fischer is married to Diana. Müller and Diana have 1 child, named Imke.
Education Background:
Müller received his secondary school diploma from Goethe-Gymnasium Berlin in 2001.
In 2006, Müller graduated from Jacobs University Bremen with a degree.
Additionally, he went on to study at SRH University Heidelberg until 2008.
Occupation History:
Müller Schmidt Fischer is a 43 year old Editor from Germany.
Müller Schmidt Fischer's first role was as a Journalist at Bertelsmann SE & Co. KGaA, where he worked diligently from 2006 to 2008 to establish a strong reputation.
He then transitioned to Axel Springer SE as a Editor, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2010 till now.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 210000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has villa located in Essen, worth 3100000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
